getScore(address).details: The scoring logic is implementation-dependent. Scores are typically used for weighting votes and rewards.

params.user: The address of the user whose DCS score is queried.

returns._0: The DCS score as a uint256. A higher score generally indicates greater contribution or engagement.

getScore(address).notice: Retrieves the DCS score for a given user.
